resources.string: If some audio files are not visible, try another search option from the left menu

The coju.mobi™ Audio Grater app creates smaller audio file(s) (in M4A format) from any large audio file (M4A, MP3, WAV and OGG formats are supported). It’s simple user interface searches for all audio files in your device and lists them in a scrollable view. You can then select an audio file and specify the start time and duration of each smaller audio file(s) you want created. This app will then automatically create the smaller audio file(s), with a different name depending on the start time (in seconds) of that smaller audio file.
